text: Nihsansaya, allahacyaca javala kayamatace jnana ahe. Toca parjan'yavrsti karato, ani matecya garbhata je kahi ahe te janato. Konihi janata nahi ki udya kaya kamavila? Na konala he mahita ahe ki to konatya bhumivara marana pavela.1 Laksata theva, allahaca sampurna jnana balaganara ani satya jananara ahe
